title: React Developer
description:
Description

Join a high growth, venture backed construction technology startup. The company is revolutionizing the entire lifecycle of construction project managementâ€“from sales proposals through project and inventory management. Since its launch in 2022, the company has experienced explosive growth and product demand. The platform aims to provide a single solution for small to mid-size construction companies to fully manage their business.



Requirements



1. React and TypeScript

- Experience working with React 17;

- Proficient in TypeScript: typing components, props, and complex objects;

- Knowledge and use of Context API for application state management;

- Skilled in using React Query for managing query state.



2. Working with External Libraries

- Experience integrating Google Maps using the React Google Maps library;

- Proficiency in working with Axios for HTTP requests;

- Experience using Formik for form management.



3. PDF Handling

- Experience in processing and generating PDF files on the client side.



4. Testing

- Proficient in writing tests using React Testing Library.



5. SEO Optimization

- Understanding SEO principles in single-page applications (SPA);

- Experience working with React Tag Manager and integrating Google Tag Manager (GTM).



6. Development of Complex Business Logic

- Experience with projects requiring an understanding and implementation of complex business logic;

- Ability to analyze and navigate existing codebases.

- English Proficiency: Upper-intermediate level or higher.



Work conditions



We offer:

- Opportunities to work on diverse and challenging projects;

- A supportive and collaborative team environment;

- 12 vacation days per year;

- 5 sick days per year;

- English classes;

- Access to psychologist support for mental well-being.

title: Product / Project Manager
description:
Description

ScrumLaunch is a software development company supporting fast-growing US startups across various industries. With locations in Los Angeles, CA, and Portland, OR, the company is looking to hire a Project Manager to play a crucial role in onboarding new clients, ensuring smooth communication between internal teams and clients, and defining processes to drive company growth.

In this role, you will collaborate closely with the company founders and software team leaders. The ideal candidate should possess excellent interpersonal skills and a passion for continuous learning and professional development. A career at ScrumLaunch promises to be fast-paced, dynamic, and never dull.



Requirements



Must have skills:

- 5+ years of product ownership experience;

- A minimum of 3 years of hands-on experience in Software development (Web&Mobile projects);

- Business-oriented person with a mindset suited to product management;

- Practical knowledge in Scrum, Kanban, and eXtreme Programming (XP);

- Strong background in developing project workflows;

- Experience in project estimation and task prioritization under tight deadlines;

- Proficiency in Web and Mobile technologies;

- Familiarity with project management tools such as Trello, JIRA, etc.;

- Advanced English proficiency;

- Be available to communicate with customers in PST/EST time zones.



Responsibilities



- Initiate new projects and implement efficient project management processes;

- Identify project needs by interviewing project stakeholders;

- Create project and task requirements;

- Defining the product vision, strategy, and roadmap;

- Managing/ prioritizing the project backlog;

- Market research and competitive analysis;

- Project team management (Design, Development, QA);

- Contribute to improving PM processes for ongoing projects;

- Balance project scope and timeline to deliver optimal solutions;

- Resolve issues and conflicts effectively;

- Build strong relationships with clients and stakeholders through effective people management;

- Meet and exceed client expectations;

- Onboard and train new team members.

* Please note that the hiring process includes a test assignment.



Work conditions



We offer:

- Opportunities to work on diverse and challenging projects;

- A supportive and collaborative team environment;

- 12 vacation days per year;

- 5 sick days per year;

- Access to therapist and psychologist support for mental well-being.

title: Software Engineer
description:
Description

We seek a highly skilled and motivated Full-stack Engineer, with solid .Net experience, willing to dive into web scraping to join our team. If you have a passion for unlocking data from the web and enjoy the challenge of reverse engineering complex websites, ingesting terabytes of data, and building scalable decentralized systems we want to hear from you.

As a Software Engineer, you will play a critical role in reverse engineering the structure and behavior of websites to extract data efficiently and effectively. Your expertise in full-stack engineering, data streaming, web scraping, reverse engineering, and data acquisition will contribute to our mission of collecting valuable information from the web.



Requirements



Must have skills:

- Proficiency in C# and .NET Core/ASP.NET Core;

- Knowledge of RESTful API and GraphQL development;

- Understanding of microservices architecture;

- Familiarity with background services (e.g., Hangfire, Azure Functions, AWS Lambda);

- Strong skills in JavaScript, TypeScript;

- Familiarity in AWS services (EC2, Lambda, S3, SQS, DynamoDB);

- Familiarity in unit testing (xUnit, NUnit, Moq);

- Familiarity with message queues (AWS SQS, RabbitMQ, Kafka);

- Familiarity in Integration testing with Postman/Insomnia;

- Experience working in Agile/Scrum teams;

- Proficiency with Git (GitHub);

- Strong problem-solving and analytical skills;

- Effective communication for cross-functional collaboration;

- Adaptability to new technologies and frameworks.



Responsibilities



- Reverse Engineering Web Structures: Analyze and reverse engineer websites to understand their structure, data sources, and interaction patterns;

- Web Scraping Development: Develop custom web scraping services and tools to extract data from websites, APIs, and other online sources;

- Web Scraping Support: Keep our web scraping services updated on any changes in the data source collected;

- Data Parsing and Transformation: Implement data parsing and transformation processes to clean and structure scraped data for analysis;

- Crawling and Data Acquisition: Create web crawler services that navigate websites, follow links, and collect data efficiently;

- Rate Limiting and Anti-Bot Measures: Overcome anti-bot measures and implement rate-limiting strategies to scrape data while respecting websites' terms of service;

- Data Quality Assurance: Implement data quality checks to ensure accuracy and consistency in scraped data;

- Monitoring and Scalability: Set up monitoring systems to track scraping activities and ensure scalability for large-scale data acquisition;

- Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation of scraping methods, scripts, and data sources.



Additional Skills



- NodeJs experience;

- Retail/e-commerce experience/alternative data;

- Familiarity with headless browsers for automation and testing;

- Knowledge of API integration;

- Data storage and database skills for storing and managing massive log data;

- Strong SQL skills.



Work conditions



We offer:

- Opportunities to work on diverse and challenging projects;

- Flexible working conditions;

- A supportive and collaborative team environment;

- 12 vacation days per year;

- 5 sick days per year;

- English classes;

- Access to psychologist support for mental well-being.

description:

title: Full Stack Software Engineer
description:
Description

Project is an innovative company at the forefront of Environmental Consulting and Civil Engineering Industry. We are committed to revolutionizing the way these firms operate and connect with their many customers/partners. As part of our dedicated team, you'll have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies and collaborate with talented professionals in a fast-paced environment.

We are seeking a skilled Software Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be proficient in technologies such as Meteor, Node.js, MongoDB, Semantic UI, React, Microservice Architecture, and TypeScript. As a Software Engineer, you will be responsible for full-stack web application development, including creating new features, testing them, managing customer requests, and fixing support tickets.



Requirements



Must have skills:

- Proven experience in software development with expertise in technologies such as Meteor, Node.js, MongoDB, Semantic UI, React, Microservice Architecture, and TypeScript;

- Strong understanding of full-stack web development principles and best practices;

- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills;

- Ability to work independently and as part of a collaborative team;

- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills;

- Prior experience in Web App Development is a plus.



Responsibilities



- Develop and maintain full-stack web applications using technologies such as Meteor, Node.js, MongoDB, Semantic UI, React, Microservice Architecture, and TypeScript;

- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, implement, and deploy new features;

- Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code;

- Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure the quality and reliability of software applications;

- Manage customer requests and provide timely resolutions to support tickets;

- Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and best practices in software development.



Work conditions



We offer:

- Opportunities to work on diverse and challenging projects;

- Flexible working conditions;

- A supportive and collaborative team environment;

- 12 vacation days per year;

- 5 sick days per year;

- English classes;

- Access to psychologist support for mental well-being.
